verbose_text: In this study, we performed bio imaging analysis of IgG trafficking of FCGR2B2 compartments using human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVECs) transfected with a plasmid vector containing enhanced GFP tagged FCGR2B2 (pFCGR2B2-EGFP) as an in vitro system for the analysis of FCGR2B2 expression in placental endothelial cells.
